short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto-Scroll, Continue, Copy, Fullscreen Layout, ShortCut List, Fast Edit, and many more handy features. Saves up to 50% of your time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Auto Scroll: Always scrolls down while the prompt is running.
- Auto Continue: Presses the "Continue" button for you.
- Auto Copy: Automatically copies the last result to the clipboard after completion.
- History Buttons: View and edit your prompts & results with ease.
- Layout Optimization: Utilizes all available space to display prompts and results.
- Auto Close Menu: The menu closes automatically when a prompt starts.
- Custom Prompt Editing: Click anywhere on your previous prompt to edit it.

Coding is now as simple as instructing AI to do it for you. With ChatGPT-AUTO, you can save up to 50% of your time. Routine tasks like copying, continuing, and scrolling are now automated, freeing you from manual intervention. The layout is optimized to maximize screen space, and the menu automatically closes once a prompt starts, allowing you to focus on your work. Additionally, you can easily edit your previous prompts by clicking anywhere on the prompt.
